full_threads.body: Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks so much!

Hi Anna,

We have updated the site.

Logo has been updated
Career Image Section has been updated
About us page image is updated

Regarding the home page image. Please have a look at this https://italiandining.com.au/home-v2/ (You need to be logged in order to view the page)

'Careers at sevardi...' please update image with pic attached

"Our story" page -

Please change image of restaurant with masks to the one attached;

I'm also attaching a couple of others if there's room to add them

There are a few images that aren't if our food/pizza so not sure if they can be changed?

Many thanks for your help!
Anna

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Joel,

If it's possible to change would you please update the following:

The black & white logo at top and bottom of pages should be changed to the attached logo. (I've attached various types so hopefully one is correct for your needs)

"Home page":

Very first image of pizza on home page - I'm not sure if it's possible to change this but if so can you please update with attached image of various pizzas.

Pizza next to 'Positano Cafe...' please update with second pizza image attached

I will send a second email so size not too big
Many thanks
Anna

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Good morning,

Please see the email below - would you kindly remove the NowBookIt widgets and attach the Quandoo widgets as per the below email.

Let me know if any issues.

Many thanks
Anna Leavey
Ph 0458 242 611


From: Quandoo Support AU <support.au@quandoo.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 21, 2024 3:00 PM
To: Chris Matthews <chris@italiandining.com.au>
Subject: Positano Cafe Pizzeria (Italian Dining) & Quandoo Booking Button

Hello Positano Cafe Pizzeria (Italian Dining)

Welcome to Quandoo!

We are excited to have you onboard and cannot wait to start sending you bookings!

You will receive a phone call from us soon, however in the meantime, an important part

of your package with us is a FREE BOOKING BUTTON for your website.

As you would have discussed with our sales representative, website traffic plays a very important role in the conversion of diners. By installing this booking button you can increase direct bookings by up to 70%.

Please find the various reservation widget options below so you are able to either install them yourself or pass them onto your Web Developer:

Reservation Button:
<div class="quandoo-widget-builder" data-config='{"format":"text-button","bgcolor":"#f5b016","txcolor":"#ffffff","round":"yes","position":"","font":"md","merchant":102198,"txt":"Reserve now"}'></div> <script src="https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/quandoo-website/widget-builder/quandoo-widget-builder.js"></script>

Reservation Calendar:
<div id="quandoo-booking-widget"></div> <script src="https://booking-widget.quandoo.com/index.js" data-merchant-id="102198" data-theme="light" data-primary-Color="1a70c3"></script>

Reservation Link:
https://www.quandoo.sg/checkout-widget/widget?&primaryColor=1a70c3&theme=light&aid=146&utm_source=quandoo-partner&utm_medium=widget-link&merchantId=102198

Do not worry, if you are are unsure on how to load the booking button,

we have a great article or video below.

If you still have difficulties, Quandoo has worked with all kinds of websites and helped restaurants everyday with their booking button installation.

You are more than welcome to send through your website login details and

we can start increasing your bookings in minutes.

Let's talk soon,

Jiamin

Business Center

FAQ

Referral Program

Support Hotline: (+61) 2 7201 8399

Support Hours: Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm, Saturdays: 11am to 6pm
